event.title: is located in Essa, Ontario, Canada, with Essa Township having a population of 16,901 people in 2006

data.event: The hamlet of Thornton is located in Essa, Ontario, Canada, with Essa Township having a population of 16,901 people in 2006.
The Essa Centennial Library was founded in December 1996 and contains books, videos, DVD's, and games for members to rent for periods of one to three weeks.
